1dba355a-d3d0-4e1b-a255-0d022fe0cc84.name: 战斗反射
1dba355a-d3d0-4e1b-a255-0d022fe0cc84.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

e3686791-0f0a-400b-8f46-6d7f59fb260b.name: 健康
e3686791-0f0a-400b-8f46-6d7f59fb260b.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

4eb65da7-0c95-4079-8d3f-9932bd27a32b.name: Fit, Very
4eb65da7-0c95-4079-8d3f-9932bd27a32b.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

0564845e-87e4-4649-890f-501557ff740b.name: Heroic Archer
0564845e-87e4-4649-890f-501557ff740b.notes: Reduce arrow ready time by one round with roll/penalty and Acc bonus without aiming or ignore bulk

32176592-96b3-4c40-9d54-3d8ea202c926.name: 高痛阈
32176592-96b3-4c40-9d54-3d8ea202c926.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

9d838123-fc54-498e-839f-b0110dd27c5c.name: 幸运
9d838123-fc54-498e-839f-b0110dd27c5c.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

43e3d15b-8700-4622-bda6-d9ba860a1dc9.name: 可选增益
43e3d15b-8700-4622-bda6-d9ba860a1dc9.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

b17cdc9e-0a4c-4e67-b9b5-caebf9e32fc3.name: 易于命中
b17cdc9e-0a4c-4e67-b9b5-caebf9e32fc3.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

840460b0-e68e-4da7-8c3d-b1ee320d0bf0.name: 标志性装备
840460b0-e68e-4da7-8c3d-b1ee320d0bf0.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

719643c3-2727-4a30-9450-410a1fd8764c.name: Weapon Bond
719643c3-2727-4a30-9450-410a1fd8764c.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

cb820c5c-7a82-4ae3-a6cd-7dbbd5fa7a81.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

93338904-cacc-43fa-bbed-17161a8cf972.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

91c56c0f-04c4-4f3f-9d7e-a3016fe4048e.name: 1cp to raise one of these skills by a level or -1 pont for another non-melee secondary skill at one level lower

2005e24b-339e-4c1c-95cd-4e526a3daf86.name: OR 2 points to raise one of those skills by a level

acdc0610-5307-4f6f-a8af-4e6f279e1885.name: One of these two 8-point mele skills packages
